me.title: About me
me.text: I am Luis Fernando Rengifo Ruiz and I live in Medell√≠n Colombia, I learned to program self-taught and with my learning I was able to do some personal projects and some freelance work, I have worked in a group and I always communicate well with people with respect and clarity, I like to contribute my ideas and listen to other opinions. In my spare time I ride a bicycle and study to learn more every day.
